title: Let Living Right Place At Harbor Cove
map_address: E Hillsdale Blvd near Edgewater Blvd
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 780 Sq.
Harbor Cove offers its residents an enriched lifestyle: A selection of luxurious rental homes, impeccable service, appealing amenities and an outstanding location.
Oscar Wilde said, "I'm a person of simple tastes.
I'm satisfied with only the best."
Consider The Harbor Cove your finest choice.
Prices are subject to change based on availability and qualification of applicant, additional fees may apply, OAC.
Pricing only available on specifically advertising unit and subject to the applicant’s qualification and OAC.

Full-size washer & dryers in unit, Vinyl Flooring Throughout (on select units), Walk-in closets, Private Patios/Balconies, Pet Friendly, Assigned Parking, Storage Space, Stainless Steel Appliances, Cable Ready
Game Room, Sparkling Swimming Pool, Clubhouse, Close to Shopping and restaurants, Business Conference Center, Public Transportation, Playground, Pet-friendly, Fitness Center
Cats and Dogs accepted, no more than 2 per apartment
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
